job.title: Technical Product Manager, Data Science & Analytics, Apple Media Products - Cupertino
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brAt Apple great ideas have a way of becoming phenomenal products services and customer experiences very quickly If you are a selfmotivated highenergy individual who is not afraid of challenges were looking for you Apple is seeking a proven Technical Product Manager TPM to join the Apple Media Products Data Science teambrbrbrThe TPM plays a critical role in collaborating with engineering and data scientists to design maintain build or improve missioncritical datasets from a multitude of sources This role will involve working with internetscale data across numerous product and customer touch points to drive initiatives that will make our data science organization more streamlined and productivebrbrbrThe teams culture is centered on rapid iteration with open feedback and debate along the way plus tightknit collaboration with data scientists product feature engineering and data engineeringbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brProven experience in a Technical Product Management role preferably for a digitalmedia or subscription businessbrbrProven experience in datarelated programming languages eg SQL PySpark Python or RbrbrKnowledge of ClientServer metrics logging strategies as well as data architecture required for analysisbrbrHands on experience with the endtoend data lifecycle across petabyte scale technologiesbrbrPrior experience in a technical role preferably as a data analyst or engineer delivering data insights to stakeholders brbrStrong experience designing and driving product strategy crossfunctionally collaborating with partners of various technical levelsbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brData is our product We are looking for a selfstarting motivated individual with great communication skills that is passionate about managing and developing critical datasets to maximize Data Science capabilities  If you have a passion for Apple services TV Music Arcade Podcasts etc it would be a big plusbrbrbrYou should have a strong interest in driving large scale data products engaging with key business stakeholders involved and driving key communications throughout the businessbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBachelors degree or equivalent work experience in Engineering Computer Science or Business Information Systemsbrbr brRole Number 200242971brbr
